greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of n X n (0,1)-matrices with zero permanent.
reference: C. J. Everett and P. R. Stein, The asymptotic number of (0,1)-matrices with zero permanent, Disc. Math. 6 (1973), 29-34.
link: Index entries for sequences related to binary matrices
formula: a(n) is asymptotic to n(2^(n^2 - n + 1)). [Everett and Stein]
mathematica: a[ n_] := Count[Table[Permanent[Partition[a, n]], {a, Tuples[{0, 1}, n^2]}], 0]; (* _Michael Somos_, Aug 05 2018 *)
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Oct 03 2003
